title: Build a World
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 62 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: In Build a World, students will read about a child who creates her own world using a computer tablet. Detailed, colorful illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive sentence patterns will support readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the setting of a story, as well as how to locate and use plural nouns.
reviewWords: build, clouds, empty, friends, water, world
awareness: Final Consonants                : Discriminate final consonant /z/ sound
grammar: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word my
